attributes.action: Change food laws to clearly say if food product is vegan or gluten free
attributes.additional_details: It is well known that the meat and dairy industry are massive cause to global warming. To help teach people we must make it easier for them to make different choices. We need fast action. We need change.
attributes.background: We must make it easier for people to learn and understand what we eat. It is well known that the meat and dairy industry's are massive causing factors to global warming. We need to educate people and we must make it easier for them to make different choices.

rejection.details:
There is already a law that covers the labelling of gluten free products, so we're not sure exactly what more you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  
https://www.coeliac.org.uk/gluten-free-diet-and-lifestyle/food-shopping/food-labels/

There is an open petition about the labelling of vegan food which you might like to sign:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253314
